<Effect> Unlocks the Buried Wonder, the Bottomless Pit
Old Translation:
我们应该算是到了轨迹的尽头。一个黑暗的深坑吞噬了所有的轨迹。

我们掌握的技术不足以测量这个坑的深度。科学家们对这种奇怪的现象感到困惑和不安。似乎偶尔有物体被缓慢地拖向裂开的深渊，掉进去后就再也没人见到过。

科学家们希望能对这个窟窿进行实验和研究，他们相信能找到目前这种无法解释现象的答案。

<Effect>解锁埋藏的奇观：无底深坑

Text: Lets get to the bottom of this.
Translation: 我們來解開這的謎團吧。

Text:
As predicted by our Geologists, the stalactite is a real treasure!
The vibrations were caused by small cavities filled with gas slowly collapsing. Some were intact and we were able to determine Mars’ atmosphere composition from thousands of years ago. Even though our geologists are still extracting the data, but this is already proving to be a major discovery!

<effect> Gain <research(5000)>
Translation:
我們的地質學家所料不差，鐘乳石是個好寶貝！
振動是由充滿氣體的小腔室緩慢坍塌引起的。一部分完好無損，我們設法確定了數千年前火星的大氣組成。雖然我們的地質學家仍在提取資料，但事實證明這已經是一項重大的發現了！

<effect>獲得<research(5000)>
Old Text: As predicted by our Geologists, the stalagmite is a treasure!
Old Translation: 我们的地质学家所料不差，这个石笋是宝贝！

Text: Unfortunately, this location did not contain any usable rare metals. Our geologists did warn us of this being a possibility, but it is disappointing nonetheless.
Translation: 很不幸，這裡沒有任何可用的稀有金屬。雖然我們的地質學家確實預告過這種可能性，但這還是令人失望。

Text:
We have found a rich deposit of rare metals just like our geologists predicted! It is good to see that our efforts have paid off. Lets put the gained resources to good use! 

<effect> A new rare metal deposit has been revealed.
Translation:
如我們的地質學家預測的那樣，我們發現了富含稀有金屬的資源點！真高興看到我們的努力沒有白費。讓我們好好利用獲得的資源吧！

<effect>已發現一處新稀有金屬資源點。
Old Text: We have found a rich deposit of rare metals just like our geologists predicted! It is good to see that our efforts have paid off. Lets put the gained resources to good use!
Old Translation: 如我们的地质学家预测的那样，我们发现了富含稀有金属的资源点！真高兴看到我们的努力没有白费。让我们好好利用获得的资源吧！

Translation: 稀有異象已分析：隆隆聲

Text:
The probe's drill picked up rumbles coming from deeper within Mars. Something that may indicate Mars is still more volcanically active than we thought. This must be related to the underground Marsquakes we occasionally experience.

Mars was long thought to be volcanically extinct. But earlier studies already indicated there might be a fault line near the Cerberus Fossae. The readings from our probe indicate much more magma flows than our most optimistic predictions.

How should we prepare our colony for this?
Translation:
探機的鑽頭接收到了來自火星深處的隆隆聲。這說明火星的火山或許比我們想象得更加活躍。這一定與我們偶爾會遇到的地下地震有關。

長久以來，人們普遍認為火星已經不存在火山活動了。但更早的研究已經表明科伯洛斯槽溝附近可能存在一條斷層線。我們探機的讀數表明那裡流動的岩漿比我們最樂觀的估計還要多得多。

對此，我們的殖民地應該做何準備？

Text: Investigate ways to capture asteroids and get Exotic Minerals
Translation: 調查捕獲小行星以及獲取奇異礦物的方式

Text: Explore the underground as fast as possible
Let's just stick to the surface
Translation: 我們還是在地表待著吧

Text:
It seems we already had the <text_param1> breakthrough.

<effect> Gain <research(reg_param1)> Research
Translation:
看起來我們已經有了<text_param1>突破性技術。

<effect>獲得<research(reg_param1)>研究點數
附近塌方的隧道已開放

Text:
We've pushed safety protocols as far as we could and cleared a few nearby Collapsed Tunnels. Going any further would risk new collapses, but this should enable us to explore further again.

<effect> Cleared nearby Collapsed Tunnels
Translation:
我們最大限度運用安全協議，清理了附近的幾處塌方的隧道。繼續前進就有再次塌方的風險，但只有這樣才能進一步探索。

<effect>清理附近塌方的隧道

Text:
Our researchers pulled a few all nighters and successfully researched Low-G Tunnel Supports. Our probes also found a few Exotic Minerals, which we need for building these Support Struts.

<effect> Researched Low-G Tunnel Supports
<effect> Found Exotic Minerals (<preciousminerals(reg_param1)>)
Translation:
我們的研究員熬夜加了幾次班，成功研究出了低重力隧道支撐。我們的探機還發現了一些奇異礦物，這正是我們建造這些支撐柱所需的。

<effect>研究低重力隧道支撐
<effect>發現奇異礦物（<preciousminerals(reg_param1)>）

Text:
It'll be difficult to maintain our colony on Mars without having infrastructure set up on the surface. We will do our best to secure a stable colony for you.

<effect> Unlocked a random breakthrough
Translation:
若不在地表建造基建設施，我們在火星上的殖民地就很難維持。我們會竭盡全力建設一座穩定的殖民地。

<effect>已解鎖隨機突破性技術
稀有異象已分析：失敗的偵察任務

Text:
We've found the buried remains of an earlier reconnaissance mission. The mission took place a couple years before our first rocket was launched to Mars. It seems a malfunction caused it to crash into the Martian surface at full speed, crashing into a lava tube and getting buried down here.

Most of the rocket is unusable, but our scans show the cargo is mostly intact. We could blow a hole into the side and retrieve its resources. The engines are still unstable, and may explode while we're busy.

We won't be able to salvage all resources without destroying the rest. Which resources would you like us to retrieve.
Translation:
我們發現了之前一次失敗偵察任務的殘骸該次任務發生在我們第一艘火箭駛向火星的數年前。似乎一次故障導致它以全速墜落在了火星表面，並穿過地表，進入了一條熔岩管，最後埋在了此處。

火箭大部分已不可用，但我們的掃描顯示上面的貨物大部分完好無損。我們應該在其側面開個洞，並取出其中的資源。引擎依然不太穩定，有可能會在我們作業過程中爆炸。

我們無法回收所有資源，必須捨棄其中的一部分。你想要我們回收哪種資源。

Text:
While we were retrieving the resources, something set off the engine and what fuel was still remaining within the rocket's tanks. The whole thing exploded.

Fortunately we were still able to retrieve the resources you requested and there was no other damage to equipment or personnel.
Translation:
我們正忙著回收資源時，不知什麼東西引爆了引擎和火箭燃料箱裡剩餘的燃料。整枚火箭都爆炸了。

好在我們依然回收到了你要求的資源，裝置和人員也沒有受到其他傷害。
稀有異象已分析：地下湖泊

Text:
We have discovered evidence of buried lakes underneath the surface of Mars. Understanding more about Mars will give us an easier time to build and expand here.

Even before arriving on Mars, studies proposed the existence of lakes of liquid water buried underground. Most of these were thought to be around the poles. Now we've actually found one, we can do a thorough study to investigate their origins, salinity and much more.

This will greatly help our research on Mars. Which tech field should we prioritize?

<effect> Reduces the costs of the chosen tech field by <reg_param1>%
Translation:
我們發現了埋在火星地表之下湖泊的跡象。繼續瞭解火星能讓我們更加輕鬆地來此處建造擴張。

在抵達火星之前，就有研究表明火星地下可能存在液態淡水湖。人們本以為大多數這樣的湖泊位於兩極附近。我們現在真找到了一片湖泊，可以詳細調查研究其起源、含鹽量和更多方面的情況了。

這對我們的火星研究將大有益處。我們應該優先關注哪個技術領域？

<effect>所選技術領域的花費降低<reg_param1>%

Text:
Our probes found what appears to be an alien tomb. Large basalt slabs protect a small chamber from the crushing weight of the martian surface. Within it lies a metallic box, almost shaped like a coffin. Our probes carefully remove the lid, to find it's empty. On the outside, the coffin is filled with weird symbols and drawings.

We immediately made pictures and scans of the area, spent time analyzing the drawings which appear to be schematics for some kind of structure. But when we sent the probes back in there was nothing to find. Was this place even real...

Looking at the schematics, they are very similar to...
Translation:
我們的探機發現了疑似外星墳墓的東西。數塊大型玄武岩板保護著一個小房間免遭火星地表的巨大重量壓垮。房間內是一個金屬箱，形狀很像一口棺材。我們的探機小心翼翼地開啟了箱蓋，發現裡面空空如也。棺材外側到處都是怪異的符號和圖畫。

我們立刻拍攝掃描了該區域，並花時間分析了這些看起來像是某種建築簡圖的圖畫。但我們將探機再次派往該處時，發現那裡空無一物。這個地方真的存在過嗎……

這些簡圖看起來很像……

Text:
It seems we already had <text_param1> unlocked, so we focused our efforts on techs we were currently researching.

<effect> Gain <research(reg_param1)> Research
Translation:
我們似乎已經解鎖了<text_param1>，因此我們將精力投入到當前正在研究的技術中。

<effect>獲得<research(reg_param1)>研究點數

Text: We've researched the <text_param1> tech. Now we can build <text_param2> whenever you want.
Translation: 我們已研究了<text_param1>技術。現在我們可以隨時建造<text_param2>了。

Text: Rare Anomaly Analyzed: Ode to Mars
Translation: 稀有異象已分析：火星頌歌

Text:
The RC Explorer found a small amount of Exotic Minerals placed as if Mars itself wanted us to find it.

It made us reflect on the long journey humanity took to get here. Staring at a red dot in the sky for millennia, gradually taking more detailed pictures from it. After we learned how to fly, we immediately looked on Mars. Now taking pictures from closer and closer, until we actually set foot on Mars.

We are confident you will lead this mission to a success, commander. What do you need from earth to make it so?
Translation:
遙控探索者發現了少量奇異礦物，其所處位置就好像火星想要我們發現一樣。

這讓我們回顧人類為了來到這裡而走過的漫長旅程。幾千年來，人們只能盯著天空中的這個小紅點，拍攝越來越清晰的照片。我們學會飛行後，就立刻將目光投向了火星。我們從越來越近的地方拍攝火星的照片，直到有一天終於踏上了火星。

指揮官，我們確信你一定會帶領這次任務走向成功。為此，你需要地球提供何種協助？
Old Text:
The RC Explorer found a small amount of Exotic Minerals placed as if Mars itself wanted us to find it.

It made us reflect on the long journey humanity took to get here. Staring at a red dot in the sky for millennia, gradually taking more detailed pictures from it. After we learned how to fly, we immediately looked on Mars. Now taking pictures from closer and closer, until we actually set foot on Mars.

We are confident you will lead this mission to a success, commander. What do you need form earth to make it so?
Old Translation:
遥控探索者发现了少量奇异矿物，其所处位置就好像火星想要我们发现一样。

这让我们回顾人类为了来到这里而走过的漫长旅程。几千年来，人们只能盯着天空中的这个小红点，拍摄越来越清晰的照片。我们学会飞行后，就立刻将目光投向了火星。我们从越来越近的地方拍摄火星的照片，直到有一天终于踏上了火星。

指挥官，我们确信你一定会带领这次任务走向成功。为此，你需要地球提供何种协助？

Text: We've already got everything we need

Our sponsor immediately went to work, and managed to get us several new applicants.

<effect> <reg_param1> new <text_param2> applicants
Translation:
我們的贊助者立刻開展工作，設法給我們召集到了數名新應徵者。

<effect> <reg_param1>名新<text_param2>應徵者

Text: We'll get them to Mars right away!
Translation: 我們會立刻送他們上火星！

Text:
Our colonists are happy to hear that

<effect> All colonists gain <reg_param1> Morale for <reg_param2> sols
Translation:
我們的殖民地居民很高興得知

<effect>所有殖民地居民獲得<reg_param1>士氣，持續<reg_param2>個太陽日。
稀有異象已分析：《蒙娜麗莎》

Text:
A few probes we sent down into a narrow crevice found something peculiar; a rock formation in the side of the crevice had almost the exact shape as the Mona Lisa. Usually it requires low resolution images or squinting your eyes to recognize a face in a rock formation. But this clearly looks close to the Mona Lisa.

Our sponsors requested us to dig out the rock shape and send it back to earth. They wish to put it on display next to the real one. In return, they are willing to send us a few early prototypes of buildings. Which should we get?
Translation:
我們往狹窄裂隙裡派遣的探機中，有幾架發現了不同尋常的東西。裂隙一側岩層的形狀幾乎和《蒙娜麗莎》一模一樣。通常需要低解析度影象或眯起眼睛才能看清岩層上的人臉形狀。但這次不同，看起來和《蒙娜麗莎》十分相似。

我們的贊助者要求我們挖出岩層並將其送回地球。他們想要將其放在原作旁邊展出。作為回報，他們願意給我們一些建築的早期原型。我們應該拿什麼？

Text: They've sent us <reg_param1> <text_param1>. You will find them amongst our prefabs on the surface, commander.
Translation: 他們給了我們<reg_param1><text_param1>。指揮官，東西已經和我們在地表的預製件放在一起了。
稀有異象已分析：玄武岩柱

Text:
We've found a cave lined with hexagonal pillars. Some immediately called it proof for aliens, but these are the result of a natural process called columnar jointing.

Some of our scientists have immediately started sharing pictures with their friends and families. It seems a lot of colonists and people on earth are interested in seeing these columns first hand.

Where should we start with setting up a base in the area?
Translation:
我們發現了一處排列著六邊形石柱的洞穴。有些人立刻將其視為外星人存在的證據，但這些柱子是天然形成的，形成過程稱為柱狀節理。

部分科學家立刻開始與朋友以及家人分享照片。似乎不少殖民地居民和地球人們想要親眼看看這些石柱。

在這個區域裡我們該如何著手建立基地？

Text: Get an Asteroid Lander so we can mine Asteroids for Exotic Minerals
Translation: 弄一枚小行星登陸艙，以開採小行星上的奇異礦物

Text: Focus on optimizing our Recon & Expansion research
Translation: 專心最佳化我們的偵察和擴張研究

Text: We need to improve our research as soon as possible
Translation: 我們的研究需要儘快改良

Text:
Our sponsor agrees and they sent us an Asteroid Lander free of charge. This will provide a sustainable way of getting Exotic Minerals, which will help set up a safe base in the underground.

<effect> Received an Asteroid Lander
Translation:
我們的贊助者同意了，他們免費送了我們一枚小行星登陸艙這樣一來我們就能持續不斷地獲得奇異礦物，這有助於我們在地下建立一座安全的基地。

<effect>獲得了一枚小行星登陸艙
獲得了一枚小行星登陸艙

Text:
Our scientists have found beauty in Mars' geological phenomena and found similar ways to optimize our research efforts.

<effect> Reduced the cost of Recon & Expansion techs by <reg_param1>%
Translation:
我們的科學家看到了火星地質現象的美妙之處，想出了類似的辦法來最佳化我們的研究工作。

<effect>偵察和擴張技術花費降低<reg_param1>%

Text:
We sent out all driller probes we had available to dig up small bits of Exotic Minerals. They managed to collect just enough before they broke down.

<effect> Found Exotic Minerals (<preciousminerals(reg_param1)>)
Translation:
我們派出了所有可用的鑽探機挖掘奇異礦物碎塊。它們最後剛好收集到了足夠多的礦物，之後就報廢了。

<effect>已發現奇異礦物（<preciousminerals(reg_param1)>）

Text:
We combined all our efforts and managed to get quite a bit of research done in a short period of time. It does seem pushing our scientists any more like this will burn them out.

<effect> Gain <research(reg_param1)> Research
Translation:
我們合力一處，成功在短時間完成了多項研究。看樣子如果再像這樣壓榨我們的科學家，他們就會累垮。

<effect>獲得<research(reg_param1)>研究點數

Text:
The RC Explorer did an extensive survey and analysis of the area, and found nothing. Some colonists are starting to question the meaning of our colony. Where it seemed a grand step for humanity at first, they now start to wonder whether they should've stayed on earth.

In moments like these our colonists look at you, commander. To set an example and for guidance. What do you say?

<effect> Unlock a new breakthrough tech:
Translation:
遙控探索者對該區域進行了詳盡的調查分析，結果一無所獲。部分殖民地居民開始質疑我們殖民地存在的意義。雖然起初看起來像是人類文明的一大步，但他們現在開始琢磨自己是否還是乖乖呆在地球上為妙。

在這樣的時刻，殖民地居民們就都仰仗指揮官你了。樹立榜樣，引導民眾。你意下如何？

<effect>解鎖一項新的突破性技術：

Text: Next we shall conquer the night
Translation: 接下來我們要征服黑夜

Text: Living and working on Mars is more fulfilling than on earth
Translation: 在火星上生活工作比在地球上更充實

Text: The underground is our next grand step
Translation: 地下就是我們接下來要邁出的一大步

Text: Unfortunately our colonists are just a means to an end
Translation: 很不幸，我們的殖民地居民只是達到目的的手段

Text:
It seems you've inspired the people to spend more time awake on Mars, to really enjoy everything life on Mars has to offer.

We've unlocked the <text_param1> breakthrough. We can put our researchers on it whenever you want, commander.
Translation:
看樣子你激勵了火星上的人民縮短了睡眠時間，來真正享受火星生活的方方面面。

我們解鎖了<text_param1>突破性技術。指揮官，我們隨時都可以讓研究人員開始研究。

Text:
It seems you've inspired the people to spend more time awake on Mars, to really enjoy everything life on Mars has to offer.

It seems we already had the <text_param1> breakthrough.

Text:
After analyzing some samples from strange markers on the cave floor, we've found some traces of an unknown virus. A second scan confirmed our suspicions. We've found a new virus native to Mars.

Some kind of material was able to preserve the virus for thousands, if not millions of years. Viruses are only found where there is life, so this should confirm there once was life on Mars. If it's not still here.

The medical community warns us that if there is ever an outbreak, it may kill all our colonists. So, perhaps we should try to rely less on people. What do you think, commander?

Text:

Our scientists immediately started reviewing the diagnostics. They found that specific components of the RC Explorer were directly receiving commands from something small enough to infiltrate its circuitry.

An electrical discharge and reboot later, we managed to restore the RC Explorers use and capture a sample of the material that caused this behavior. It turns out to be nano robots, that must have been buried here for ages.

Researching these nanites will enable us to apply them to a certain area and mass produce them. Where do you think they'd be most useful?

Text:
Our exploration team found what appears to be corroded bricks. After a more extensive analysis, it appears remains of ancient structures are buried here. Though the corrosion shown on these bricks can only happen as a result of water.

Several scientists have started to talk about Marslantis. The leading theory is that an advanced civilization lived on Mars millions of years ago. Some kind of disaster caused their city to sink into Mars' oceans. And its remains got buried here, gradually getting covered up over millions of years.

Many other scientists believe Marslantis is a myth and claim the find is just a peculiarly shaped rock. They recommend we bolster our research efforts, and put these rumors to rest. How should we proceed?

我們發現了貫穿小行星的裂縫。

我們的挖掘站就在其中一條裂縫上。如果我們繼續開採，就有讓小行星解體的風險。甚至拆除挖掘站也有這樣的風險。

Text: The risks are too great, we have to shut down the extractor.
Translation: 風險太高了，我們得關停挖掘站。

Text: The extractor can no longer be used or salvaged
Translation: 挖掘站無法使用或回收

Text: We keep it running but at lower capacity to minimize the risk.
Translation: 我們讓它以較低的功率繼續運轉，以把風險降到最低程度。

Text: A low chance of causing a meteor storm on Mars
Translation: 有較小的可能在火星上引起隕石風暴

Text: The resources are too important we need to keep it going and hope for the best.
Translation: 資源太重要了，我們要抱著最好的期望讓它繼續運轉下去。

Text: A reasonable chance of causing a meteor storm on Mars
Translation: 有正常的可能在火星上引起隕石風暴

Text:
What we feared has come to pass. Parts of the Asteroid have broken off and will rain down on the surface of Mars.

We have send word to the colony to brace themselves. It is out of our hands from here. We can only hope.

<effect> Meteors will rain down on the surface colony
Translation:
我們擔心的事情已經發生了。小行星的一部分解體了，將落在火星表面。

我們得通知殖民地，讓他們做好準備。我們這裡已經無法控制了。只能心懷希望了。

<effect>流星雨將落在地表殖民地
Old Text:
What we feared has come to pass. Parts of the Asteroid have broken off and will rain down on the surface of Mars.

We have send word to the colony to brace themselves. It is out of our hands from here. We can only hope.

<Effect> Meteors will rain down on the surface colony
Old Translation:
我们担心的事情已经发生了。小行星的一部分解体了，将落在火星表面。

我们得通知殖民地，让他们做好准备。我们这里已经无法控制了。只能心怀希望了。

<Effect>流星雨将落在地表殖民地

Text:
While up on the Asteroid our drones have managed to capture some breathtaking images of our new home Planet.

Looking at the images still fills us with hope and wonder. We have come so far to make this hostile planet our home and we will go much further still. We deserve to be proud.

<effect> Colonist Morale increased for <sols(morale_duration)> Sols
Translation:
在小行星上，我們的無人機設法拍攝了幾張我們新家園行星的照片。

看著這些照片，我們依然充滿希望和驚歎。我們穿越茫茫太空來到這裡，把這顆充滿敵意的星球變成我們的家園，我們還會取得更大的成就。我們理應自豪。

<effect>殖民地居民士氣上升，持續<sols(morale_duration)>個太陽日
Old Text:
While up on the Asteroid our drones have managed to capture some breathtaking images of our new home Planet.

Looking at the images still fills us with hope and wonder. We have come so far to make this hostile planet our home and we will go much further still. We deserve to be proud.

<Effect> Colonist Morale increased for <sols(morale_duration)> Sols
Old Translation:
在小行星上，我们的无人机设法拍摄了几张我们新家园行星的照片。

看着这些照片，我们依然充满希望和惊叹。我们穿越茫茫太空来到这里，把这颗充满敌意的星球变成我们的家园，我们还会取得更大的成就。我们理应自豪。

<Effect>殖民地居民士气上升，持续<sols(morale_duration)>个太阳日

Text: We Can See Our House From Here
Translation: 我們可以從這裡看到我們的房子

Text: We have observed a star similar to our Sun being swallowed by a black hole. During this tidal disruption event, half the star was consumed while the other half was torn apart and flung back into space. This spaghettification of the star resulted in strands of light unlike anything we have seen. While the display of light is spectacular to witness, the idea that this could happen out of nowhere to our solar system is worrying.
Translation: 我們觀察到一顆與太陽相似的恆星被黑洞吞沒在這次潮汐力瓦解事件中，恆星的一半被吞噬了，剩下的一半被撕裂，拋向了太空。這顆恆星的麵條狀結構形成了我們從未見過的光束。儘管光束的景象看起來很是壯觀，但“這可能突然發生在我們的太陽系”的想法令人擔憂。

Text: Publish the findings, implications be damned!
Translation: 公佈該發現，管他會產生什麼影響呢！

Text: Increases the morale of Scientists and slightly decreases morale of all other colonists
Translation: 提升科學家計程車氣，小幅降低其他殖民地居民計程車氣

Text: We will focus our efforts on detecting Black Holes that present a risk to our solar system!
Translation: 我們將全力檢測對太陽系構成威脅的黑洞！
小幅提升所有的殖民地居民士氣

Text: There is nothing to worry about the odds of this happening to us are extremely low.
Translation: 沒什麼好擔心的，這種事情在我們身上發生的機率微乎其微。

Old Text: Increases the morale of Scientist
Old Translation: 提升科学家的士气

Text: We have detected a corrupted signal trying to connect to some of our Drone Hub Extenders! We can develop countermeasures, but this takes time. We don't know what kind of damage the unknown signal could do in the meantime.
Translation: 我們檢測到一個有害訊號正試圖連線到我們的無人機中心擴充套件！我們可以制定對策，但這需要時間。我們不知道未知訊號在這期間會造成什麼樣的破壞。

Text: Shut down the effected Drone Hub Extenders until the countermeasures are complete!
Translation: 關閉受影響的無人機中心擴充套件，直至對策制定完成！

Text: A number of drone hub extenders will be unusable for <sols(downtime)> Sols
Translation: 很多無人機中心擴充套件將不可使用，持續<sols(downtime)>個太陽日

Text: The signal is probably nothing. Keep the systems going while we develop the countermeasures.
Translation: 訊號可能沒什麼影響。在我們制定對策時，保持系統運轉。

Text: Some drones might be damaged during development
Translation: 制定過程中，可能有無人機受損

Text:
It seems the corrupt signal has gained access to some of our drones! After displaying some highly erratic behavior the affected drones broke down completely. Upon investigating the drones, it seems the internal wiring of the drones have burned out, leaving us unable to repair them. 

It isn't too late to shut down the Drone Hub Extenders to prevent further damage!
Translation:
有害訊號似乎已經控制了我們的一部分無人機！在表現出非常怪異的行為後，受影響的無人機就徹底損壞了。調查無人機結果顯示，無人機內部電路似乎燒燬了，我們無法修復它們。

現在關閉無人機中心擴充套件防止進一步的損失還不算太晚！

Text: Shut down the Drone Hub Extenders until we complete the countermeasures!
Translation: 關閉無人機中心擴充套件，直至我們制定完對策！

Text: A number of drone hub extenders will be unusable for <sols(remainingtime)> Sols
Translation: 很多無人機中心擴充套件將不可使用，持續<sols(remainingtime)>個太陽日
Old Text: A number of drone hub extenders will unusable for <sols(remainingtime)> Sols
Old Translation: 很多无人机中心扩展将不可使用，持续<sols(remainingtime)>个太阳日

Text: Keep the Drone Hub Extenders online. The odds of the signal striking again seem low.
Translation: 保持無人機中心擴充套件線上。訊號再次攻擊的機率似乎很低。

Text: Additional drones might be damaged during development.
Translation: 制定過程中，可能有更多的無人機受損。

Text:
The signal gained access to more of our drones! The results are similar to the previous event but affect even more drones this time around. 

Commander, please consider our continued course of action!
Translation:
訊號控制了我們更多的無人機！結果和之前的事件類似，但這次影響到了更多的無人機。

指揮官，請考慮我們的繼續行動方案！

Text: Shut down the Drone Hub Extenders until we complete the countermeasures!
Translation: 關閉無人機中心擴充套件，直至我們制定完對策！

Text: A number of drone hub extenders will be unusable for <sols(remainingtime)> Sols
Translation: 很多無人機中心擴充套件將不可使用，持續<sols(remainingtime)>個太陽日
Old Text: A number of drone hub extenders will unusable for <sols(remainingtime)> Sols
Old Translation: 很多无人机中心扩展将不可使用，持续<sols(remainingtime)>个太阳日

Text: Keep the Drone Hub Extenders online. The odds of the signal striking again seem low.
Translation: 保持無人機中心擴充套件線上。訊號再次攻擊的機率似乎很低。

Text: Additional drones might be damaged during development.
Translation: 制定過程中，可能有更多的無人機受損。

Text: Our countermeasures have been deployed! The corrupt signal can no longer do any damage to our network. Interestingly the signal seemed to disappear almost simultaneously with the upload of our countermeasures. Our scientists are frustrated with its disappearance as they were not successful in tracing it back. It seems we will remain in the dark about the signal's origins.
Translation: 我們的對策已部署！有害訊號再也無法破壞我們的網路了。有意思的是，訊號幾乎是隨著我們上傳對策的同時消失了。我們的工程師很沮喪，因為它的消失讓他們無法逆向追蹤。看起來我們還是對訊號的來源一無所知。

Text:
In our most recent observations we've found evidence against the existence of Dark Matter, and in support of a different model of gravity.

Our current model for gravity doesn't fully explain the speed at which we see galaxies rotate, indicating there is a lot of mass missing. Which is where dark matter comes in. Yet different models of gravity solve this differently, and recent observations confirm one of these may be a better model for physics.

Our community of scientists is in disarray, unsure which model of gravity to keep using. What do we do commander?
Translation:
在最近的觀察中，我們找到了反對暗物質存在的證據，該證據還支援另一種不同的引力模型。

我們現在的引力模型不足以充分解釋我們看到的星系自轉速度，這表明質量上有很多缺失。這就是暗物質的來源。但是，不同的引力模型對此的解釋不一樣，最近的觀察確認其中的一種可能是更好的物理模型。

我們的科學家群體對此也莫衷一是，不確定繼續使用哪種引力模型。我們該怎麼辦，指揮官？

Text: Get research boost for physics techs
Translation: 獲得物理學技術的研究加成
Old Text: get research boost for physics techs
Old Translation: 获得物理学技术的研究加成

Translation: 部分科學家鬆了一口氣

Text:
They are happy they can keep using the currently accepted models and don't need to adjust all their research. This should make future researches depending on physics easier.

<effect> Get a research boost for physics techs
Translation:
他們很高興能繼續使用目前公認的模型，不需要改變所有的研究。這將使今後依靠物理學的研究更容易。

<effect>獲得物理學技術的研究加成
Old Text:
They are happy they can keep using the currently accepted models and don't need to adjust all their research. This should make future researches depending on physics easier.

<effect> get a research boost for physics techs
Old Translation:
他们很高兴能继续使用目前公认的模型，不需要改变所有的研究。这将使今后依靠物理学的研究更容易。

<effect>获得物理学技术的研究加成

Text:
A part of the science community is excited about the news, and there's a burst of new papers being published which fit with our new model of gravity.

<effect> Gain <research(bonus_research)>
Translation:
科學界的一部分人對這個訊息感到興奮，有一批符合我們新的引力模型的論文發表了出來。

<effect>獲得 <research(bonus_research)>

Text: Let them figure it out amongst themselves!

Competition erupts within the scientific community. Advocates for either side rush to find more evidence to prove their side of the argument.

<effect> Improve colonist morale for <sols(boost_duration)> Sols
Translation:
科學界內部的競爭爆發。兩邊的支持者都急於找到更多的證據，證明他們的論點。

<effect>提升殖民地居民計程車氣，持續<sols(boost_duration)>個太陽日

Text: We have Discovered a previously unknown Earth Trojan. These Asteroids have a solar orbit similar of Earth’s, and are surprisingly energy-efficient to reach. This makes them prime candidates for resource mining. We have sent the details of the discovery back to Earth. As a thank you they have offered us a reward!
Translation: 我們發現了之前未知的地球特洛依。這些小行星的太陽系軌道和地球的相似，而且花很少的能量就能到達。這使它們成為資源開採的首選物件。我們已經把發現的細節傳回地球。為表示感謝，他們給了我們一個獎勵！

Text: Funds is what we need right now
Translation: 我們現在需要的是資金

Old Text: Gain 1 supply Pod
Old Translation: 获得1个补给舱

Text:
It is as we feared: the initial repairs were not strong enough and additional repairs are required.

Unfortunately the repairs will be costly this time around. A few vital components have worn down completely and need to be replaced. It will be a big investment but this elevator plays a vital part in our exploration and colonization of the Martian underground.
Translation:
這正是我們所擔心的：最初的修復不是很牢固，還需要再次維修。

但很不幸，這次維修的費用會很高昂。幾個關鍵部件已經完全磨損了，需要替換。這筆投資會很大，但這部電梯對我們的火星地下探索和殖民有至關重要的作用。

Text:
Our Elevator to the underground of Mars has stopped functioning. We can no longer use it to move resources between the surface colony and the underground.

Our engineers offer us two options. One is a fast fix that gets resources moving again quickly, however this option is not without risk as the engineers aren't sure if it will hold. 

The other options is sure to work but will put the Elevator out of commission for quite a while.
Translation:
我們通往火星地下的電梯停止了運轉。我們再也無法用它在地表殖民地和地下間運送資源。

我們的工程師給出兩種選擇。一是快速維修，這能讓資源儘快恢復運送，但這個選擇並非沒有風險，因為工程師們不確定它是否有效。

第二種選擇肯定有效，但將會使電梯很長一段時間內無法執行。

Text: We need the elevator. A quick fix will have to do.
Translation: 我們需要電梯。進行一次快速維修應該就行了。

Text: We need to take our time to do this well.
Translation: 我們得花時間好好修理。

Text:
We have recorded an object outside the Kuiper Belt that moves in an erratic pattern. While most scientists believe this to be a new phenomenon, others claim it is very similar to how an object moves using thrusters. We only have a short recording of the phenomenon, so we are unable to gain additional data to verify either claim.

How do we publish this finding Commander?
Translation:
我們記錄到柯伊伯帶外有個物體，它以一種不規則的模式運動。絕大部分科學家認為這是一種新的現象，但其他的科學家聲稱這和使用推進器的物體運動很相似。我們只有一段很短的現象記錄，所以我們無法獲得更多資料來驗證兩種說法。

我們該如何公佈這次的發現，指揮官？

Text: Publish as a newly recorded natural phenomenon.
Translation: 作為新記錄的自然現象發表

Text: Publish as a recording of an alien device.
Translation: 作為一種外星裝置的記錄發表

Text: Commander, we have observed a signal that seems to be repeating itself. This particular Fast Radio Burst has not been recorded before and is much longer than similar events we have documented. One of our researchers believes they can decode the signal, but they are asking for substantial funding for equipment.
Translation: 指揮官，我們觀察到一個似乎正在自我重複的訊號。這種快速的無線電訊號從未被記錄過，而且比我們記載的類似事件要長得多。我們的一名研究人員認為他們可以破譯訊號，但他們為裝置申請了大量的資金。

Text:
After a trying to decipher the signal for a long time it appears we were unable to translate it. The researcher that devoted their time to the signal reports has somehow developed an uncanny ability to understand complicated equations and other mathematical problems. What caused this change is a mystery to our medical experts, we can only profit from the new genius that walks in our midst.

<effect> 1 colonist gains the Genius trait.
Translation:
雖然花了很長時間試圖破譯訊號，但我們似乎無法翻譯它。研究訊號報告的研究人員莫名其妙地獲得了一種非凡能力，可以理解複雜的方程和其他數學問題。我們的醫學專家無法解釋這種變化，我們只能從我們中的新天才受益。

<effect>1位殖民地居民獲得天才特性。
Old Text:
After a trying to decipher the signal for a long time it appears we were unable to translate it. The researcher that devoted their time to the signal reports has somehow developed an uncanny ability to understand complicated equations and other mathematical problems. What caused this change is a mystery to our medical experts, we can only profit from the new genius that walks in our midst.

<Effect> 1 colonist gains the Genius trait.
Old Translation:
虽然花了很长时间试图破译信号，但我们似乎无法翻译它。研究信号报告的研究人员莫名其妙地获得了一种非凡能力，可以理解复杂的方程和其他数学问题。我们的医学专家无法解释这种变化，我们只能从我们中的新天才受益。

<Effect>1位殖民地居民获得天才特性。

Text:
After taking a second look at our recent deep space surveys, we found a new galaxy further away than any known galaxy. At more than 33 billion light-years away, this is the furthest galaxy mankind has ever detected.

The galaxy is observed as it existed over 13.4 billion years ago, less than 350 million years after the big bang, giving us more insights into the early universe. Finding a galaxy even further away, and closer to the formation of the universe will be extremely unlikely.

<effect><progress> research points.
Translation:
在仔細研究過我們近期的深空勘測後，我們發現了一個新的星系，比已知所有的星系都要遠。該星系位於330億光年以外，是人類歷史上探測到的最遠的星系。

該星系的歷史已有134億年，距離大爆炸只有不到3.5億年時間，這讓我們對早期宇宙有了更多的瞭解。找到一個更遙遠、更接近宇宙形成的星系幾乎不可能。

<effect><progress>研究點數。

Text:
We just got approached by a rather rattled looking member of the observation teams. They claim to have observed a phenomenon that they describe as being a window into an alternate dimension.

The head researcher has not given them permission to delve deeper, attributing the observation to a glitch in the measuring instruments. The rattled scientist is urging us to overrule the head researcher’s decision and give the greenlight to delve deeper into the phenomenon.
Translation:
剛才有一名看起來很緊張的觀察組成員找到了我們。他們聲稱觀察到了一種現象，他們認為這種現象是進入另一個維度的入口。

首席研究員沒有允許他們深入研究，並把觀測結果歸於測量儀器的故障。緊張的科學家力勸我們否決首席研究員的決定，並允許深入研究這種現象。

Text: The head researcher must have had their reasons to deny this.
Translation: 首席研究員否定這一發現肯定是有原因的。

Text: Give the greenlight to proceed with the research.

Further investigation into the phenomenon has resulted in new insights into the nature of our universe and the possibility of multiple dimensions.

<effect> gain <research(new_insights)>.
Translation:
對該現象的深入調查讓我們對宇宙的本質和多維度的可能性有了新的認識。

<effect>獲得<research(new_insights)>。

Text:
We have received word that the scientist that approached us has had a lapse in sanity. They only respond to our inquiries on what they have discovered with incoherent screaming. Whatever it is they found, it is probably better for us to leave it be...

<effect> 1 Scientist suffers a severe Sanity penalty.
Translation:
我們得到訊息，找我們的那位科學家精神失常了。我們問他們發現了什麼，他們只會回以語無倫次的尖叫。不管他們發現了什麼，我們最好還是別管了……

<effect>1名科學家受到嚴重的理智度懲罰。

Text:
Astronomers here and on Earth predict the gravitational waves of 2 merging black holes will reach us soon.

Scientists from Earth are suggesting we collaborate with them in their studies on gravity. They explain that having a larger distance between the measuring devices allows them to more accurately test their theories. We would simply have to recalibrate some of our instruments.

What would you like us to do commander?
Translation:
這裡和地球上的天文學家預測到2個黑洞結合產生的引力波很快就會到達我們這裡。

地球上的科學家在建議我們與他們一起研究引力。他們解釋說，測量裝置間有更遠的距離，這能讓他們更精準地測試理論。我們只需要簡單校準一些儀器即可。

你希望我們怎麼做，指揮官？

Text: As long as they pay us for the effort!
Translation: 只要他們為我們的努力付錢就可以了！

Text: This would be a great opportunity to share our knowledge
Translation: 這將是分享我們知識的絕好機會

Text: Our colonists are reporting unnerving sounds coming from the tunnels of the Martian underground. Some claim that the sounds resemble the howling of mysterious creatures. Our scientists have yet to find an explanation for the phenomenon and rumors are spreading quickly.
Translation: 我們的殖民地居民報告說，從火星地下的隧道傳來令人不安的聲音。有人說那聲音像是神秘生物的嚎叫。我們的科學家還沒法解釋這種現象，謠言正在迅速傳播。

Text: We will send a small team to investigate and put these rumors to rest!
Translation: 我們將派出一小隊人去調查並平息這些謠言！

Text: A plausible sounding explanation should be plenty to ease our worried colonists.
Translation: 對聲音的合理解釋應該足以讓擔憂的殖民地居民鬆一口氣。

Text:
Our scientists have helped us create a statement on how air flow and reverberations can cause the sounds described. Extra care was taken to ensure the statement emphasizes that this phenomenon is perfectly harmless. Our colonists appeared to calm down after the statement was rolled out.

Now we can only hope that we are right...
Translation:
我們的科學家幫我們編寫了一份宣告，透過空氣流動和回聲解釋聲音的成因。我們特別注意確保強調這種現象是完全無害的。宣告發表之後，我們的殖民地居民似乎平靜下來了。

現在只能希望我們是正確的……

Text:
Our scientists have helped us create a statement on how air flow and reverberations can cause the sounds described. Extra care was taken to ensure the statement emphasizes that this phenomenon is perfectly harmless. Our colonists appeared to calm down after the statement was rolled out.

Now we can only hope that we are right...
Translation:
我們的科學家幫我們編寫了一份宣告，透過空氣流動和回聲解釋聲音的成因。我們特別注意確保強調這種現象是完全無害的。宣告發表之後，我們的殖民地居民似乎平靜下來了。

現在只能希望我們是正確的……

Text: These rumors will stop without our interference soon enough.
Translation: 我們不加干涉，這些謠言也會很快停止。

Text: Some colonists in the underground will suffer a sanity penalty from hearing the rumors.
Translation: 地下的一些殖民地居民因為聽到謠言將受到理智度懲罰。

Text: Our credibility is in shambles! Somehow the fact that the statement we released is pure speculation has come to light. Fingers are being pointed in all directions, but the fact remains that the rumors have come back in full force. At this point nothing we can say will improve the situation.
Translation: 我們的公信力一塌糊塗！我們的報告純屬推測的事實被曝光了。到處都有人指責我們，更糟的是謠言傳得更兇了。事到如今，我們說什麼都無助於改善現狀。

Text:
The specialist team that searched the tunnels has returned. Unfortunately, they haven't found the origin of the sounds. On the positive they also haven't found anything worrisome.

We will publish their findings which should at least ease the concerns about the sounds somewhat.

<effect> a small amount of colonists in the underground suffers a sanity penalty due to the rumors.
Translation:
搜查隧道的專家團隊已經回來了。很不幸，他們也沒找到聲音的來源。從好的方面看，至少他們也沒發現令人不安的地方。

我們將公佈他們的發現，這至少可以稍稍緩解人們對聲音的憂慮。

<effect>因為謠言，地下的一小部分殖民地居民受到理智度懲罰。
Old Text:
The specialist team that searched the tunnels has returned. Unfortunately, they haven't found the origin of the sounds. On the positive they also haven't found anything worrisome.

We will publish their findings which should at least ease the concerns about the sounds somewhat.

<Effect> a small amount of colonists in the underground suffers a sanity penalty due to the rumors.
Old Translation:
搜查隧道的专家团队已经回来了。很不幸，他们也没找到声音的来源。从好的方面看，至少他们也没发现令人不安的地方。

我们将公布他们的发现，这至少可以稍稍缓解人们对声音的忧虑。

<Effect>因为谣言，地下的一小部分殖民地居民受到理智度惩罚。

Text:
We have lost all contact with the team of scientist that went to investigate the origin of the ominous sounds echoing through the Martian tunnels. We fear the worst. Now we are not just stuck without an answer, but once word gets out of the disappearance the rumors will only get worse.

<effect> Lose 3 Scientists and a large number of colonists in the underground suffer a sanity penalty.
Translation:
我們和前往火星隧道調查不祥回聲來源的科學家隊伍失去了所有的聯絡。我們已經做好了最壞的打算。現在我們不僅沒有得到答案，而且一旦失蹤的訊息傳出，謠言只會越發糟糕。

<effect>損失3名科學家，大量的地下殖民地居民受到理智度懲罰。
Old Text:
We have lost all contact with the team of scientist that went to investigate the origin of the ominous sounds echoing through the Martian tunnels. We fear the worst. Now we are not just stuck without an answer, but once word gets out of the disappearance the rumors will only get worse.

<Effect> Lose 3 Scientists and a large number of colonists in the underground suffer a sanity penalty.
Old Translation:
我们和前往火星隧道调查不祥回声来源的科学家队伍失去了所有的联系。我们已经做好了最坏的打算。现在我们不仅没有得到答案，而且一旦失踪的消息传出，谣言只会越发糟糕。

<Effect>损失3名科学家，大量的地下殖民地居民受到理智度惩罚。

Text:
Our colonists in the <DisplayName> Dome are not doing well. The ever present darkness and lack of a clear day and night cycle, has made keeping morale up difficult.

If we want to keep the morale up action is required. We need to find a way to bring a positive light into their daily lives.
Translation:
我們在<DisplayName>穹頂的殖民地居民狀況不佳。持續的黑暗和缺乏明確的晝夜迴圈，讓保持士氣困難重重。

如果我們想保持士氣高昂，就必須採取行動。我們得設法在他們的日常生活中引入有益的光線。

Text: We need to invest in better light sources in the Residences to fight the oppressive darkness.
Translation: 我們得在住宅區購入更好的光源，以對抗令人壓抑的黑暗。

Text: Increases the Domes' Residence electricity consumption by <electricity_consumption>% and greatly increases colonist Morale for <sols(effect_duration)> Sols
Translation: 增加<electricity_consumption>%的穹頂住宅電力消耗，大幅提升殖民地居民計程車氣，持續<sols(effect_duration)>個太陽日

Text: We will bring them the light of religion!
Translation: 我們將帶給他們信仰之光！

Text: Increase the colonists morale for <sols(effect_duration)> Sols and will give some the Religious trait
Translation: 提升殖民地居民計程車氣，持續<sols(effect_duration)>個太陽日，並給部分居民信仰者特性

Text: We will start a mental health program to help people cope. We should not take this matter lightly.
Translation: 我們將啟動一項心理健康計劃來幫助人們熬過艱難的日子。我們不應該對此掉以輕心。

Text: Increases the morale and sanity of underground colonists for <sols(effect_duration)> Sols
Translation: 提升地下殖民地居民計程車氣和理智度，持續<sols(effect_duration)>個太陽日

Text: They just need a little more time to adjust. There is nothing we can do for them right now.
Translation: 他們只需要一點時間來適應。現在我們可幫不了他們。

Text:
It seem we have made a miscalculation regarding the Asteroid's trajectory.

Unfortunately the numbers are against us. We will have to hurry to get the resources we need and get off this asteroid before it is too late.

<effect> remaining time on Asteroid reduced
Translation:
我們似乎計算錯了小行星軌道。

不幸的是，結果對我們不利。我們要抓緊時間開採我們需要的資源，並趁還來得及時離開這顆小行星。

<effect>小行星的剩餘時間減少了
Old Text:
It seem we have made a miscalculation regarding the Asteroid's trajectory.

Unfortunately the numbers are against us. We will have to hurry to get the resources we need and get off this asteroid before it is too late.

<Effect> remaining time on Asteroid reduced
Old Translation:
我们似乎计算错了小行星轨道。

不幸的是，结果对我们不利。我们要抓紧时间开采我们需要的资源，并趁还来得及时离开这颗小行星。

<Effect>小行星的剩余时间减少了

Text:
It seem we have made a miscalculation regarding the Asteroid's trajectory.

Luckily the figures are in our favor. We have more time than than we anticipated allowing us to extract more resources. Let's make the most of the extra margin that our mistake has afforded us.

<effect> remaining time on Asteroid extended
Translation:
我們似乎計算錯了小行星軌道。

還好結果對我們有利。我們可以有比預計更多的時間來開採更多資源。我們要充分利用錯誤帶給我們的額外時間。

<effect>小行星的剩餘時間增加了
Old Text:
It seem we have made a miscalculation regarding the Asteroid's trajectory.

Luckily the figures are in our favor. We have more time than than we anticipated allowing us to extract more resources. Let's make the most of the extra margin that our mistake has afforded us.

<Effect> remaining time on Asteroid extended
Old Translation:
我们似乎计算错了小行星轨道。

还好结果对我们有利。我们可以有比预计更多的时间来开采更多资源。我们要充分利用错误带给我们的额外时间。

<Effect>小行星的剩余时间增加了

Text:
We have confirmed the existence of the much hypothesized Ninth Planet in our solar system. Astronomers considered its existence likely based on the movement of asteroids and other objects in our system. It is about 7 times the size of Earth and has an orbit that is roughly 650 times as far from the Sun. 

Its origin is still up for debate, but the confirmation of its existence is already monumental. The researchers have asked you to comment on the discovery.
Translation:
我們已經證實了太陽系中多次假設的第九大行星的存在。天文學家根據太陽系內小行星和其他物體的運動確定它的存在可能。它的大小約是地球的7倍，其軌道距離太陽約是地球的650倍。

它的起源仍有爭議，但確認它存在的意義已經非常重大了。研究人員請你對這一發現發表評論。

Text: We always knew it was there, it was only a matter of time!
Translation: 我們一直知道它在那裡，發現它只是時間問題！

Text:
After your comments were aired on Earth our sponsors were exceedingly impressed with our efforts and your leadership! They have rewarded us generously.

<effect> gain <funding(discovery_reward)>
Translation:
你的評論在地球上發表後，我們的贊助者對我們的努力和你的領導才能大加讚賞！他們慷慨地獎賞了我們。

<effect> 獲得<funding(discovery_reward)>

Text: But Pluto was the Ninth Planet, right?
Translation: 第九大行星不是冥王星嗎？

Text:
The scientific community is struck with disbelief at your ignorance. Struck by the realization that the general public might not be as well informed as they hoped, they redoubled their efforts to ensure everyone is properly educated. 

Your ignorance turned out to be a good thing!

<effect> Improve colonist morale for <sols(boost_duration)> Sols
Translation:
科學界對你的無知表示不可思議。他們意識到公眾可能沒有他們所想的那樣淵博，因此加倍努力確保每個人都受到良好的教育。

到頭來，你的無知成了好事！

<effect>提升殖民地居民計程車氣，持續<sols(boost_duration)>個太陽日
這些照片看起來是偽造的……

Text:
Baffled at the statement, our research team has put forth a monumental effort to prove you wrong. This extra effort has proved to be useful in developing other research. 

This must have been your plan all along, right commander?

<effect> Gain <research(research_reward)>
Translation:
我們的研究團隊對你的說法感到困惑，他們付出了極大的努力來證明你是錯的。事實證明，這種額外的努力在發展其他研究方面是有用的。

這些一定都在你的計劃之中，對吧指揮官？

<effect>獲得 <research(research_reward)>

Text:
We have managed to confirm the existence of the Oort Cloud. For a long time, the Oort Cloud was only hypothesized to exist, but even though it was considered likely we had no concrete proof. The cloud is mainly made up of icy planetesimals and is believed to be the origin for many, if not all, Halley-type comets in our inner solar system. 

This discovery solidifies our view of our own solar system and we are one step closer again to unraveling the secrets of the universe. In acknowledgement of our efforts our sponsors are asking us how they can best support us in making further discoveries.
Translation:
我們已經證實了奧爾特雲的存在。很長一段時間以來，人們只是假定奧爾特雲的存在，但即便如此，我們沒有確鑿的證據。該雲主要由冰凍的微行星組成，被認為是太陽系內很多（也許是全部）類哈雷彗星的起源。

這一發現證實了我們對太陽系的觀點，我們距揭開宇宙的秘密又近了一步。為了感謝我們的努力，我們的贊助者詢問他們如何才能更好地支援我們做出新的發現。

Text: Additional funds is the surest way to new discoveries.
Translation: 額外的資金是確保做出新發現最穩妥的方法。

Text: People were the real driving force behind this discovery.
Translation: 人才是發現背後真正的驅動力。
多獲得15名科學家應徵者

Text: We would like access to some of the ongoing research that is being conducted on Earth.
Translation: 我們想了解地球上正在進行的研究的。

Text:
It seems the Bottomless Pit in our colony has not gone unnoticed. We are approached by a mysterious figure who has a proposal for us.

The individual represents an organization that would like access to the Bottomless Pit. If we were to allow them access without asking too many questions they claim they can "make it worth our while".
Translation:
看起來我們殖民地的無底深坑並沒有被忽視。一名神秘人找到我們並提出一個建議。

他所代表的組織想訪問無底深坑。如果我們允許他們訪問而不問太多問題，他們聲稱可以“給我們酬謝”。

Text: Don't ask questions you don't want answers to. Lets accept their generous offer!
Translation: 不要問你不想知道答案的問題。我們接受他們的慷慨提議吧！

Text: We are payed the sum of <funding(funding_reward)>
This offer is more suspicious than the Bottomless Pit itself. No deal!
Translation: 這個提議比無底深坑更可疑。沒門！

Text: Colonists in the underground gain a Morale boost due to your decisive action for <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols
Translation: 因為你的果斷行動，地下的殖民地居民獲得士氣提升，持續<sols(morale_boost_duration)>個太陽日

Text:
The good news is that we landed on target. The bad news is that in doing so our Asteroid Lander was severely damaged.

The rocket needs to be repaired before it can make the return trip. It is unfortunate but improvisation and adaptation is what has kept us going so far.

<effect> Rocket requires <metals(repair_cost)> to be repaired
Translation:
好訊息是我們降落在目標地點。壞訊息是，我們的小行星登陸艙在此過程中嚴重受損。

火箭需要修理才能返程。這很不幸，但我們能堅持到現在靠的就是隨機應變。

<effect>火箭修復需要<metals(repair_cost)>
Old Text:
The good news is that we landed on target. The bad is that in doing so our Asteroid Lander was severely damaged.

The rocket needs to be repaired before it can make the return trip. It is unfortunate but improvisation and adaptation is what has kept us going so far.

<effect> Rocket requires <metals(repair_cost)> to be repaired
Old Translation:
好消息是我们降落在目标地点。坏消息是，我们的小行星登陆舱在此过程中严重受损。

火箭需要修理才能返程。这很不幸，但我们能坚持到现在靠的就是随机应变。

<effect>火箭修复需要<metals(repair_cost)>

Text:
We have found the remains of a Satellite on the surface of the Asteroid. It seems to have collided with it not too long ago.

After some more investigation we have concluded that we can salvage some parts of its internal memory. The data contained can be useful to our future endeavours, but unfortunately we won't be able to recover everything.
Translation:
我們在小行星表面找到了衛星的殘骸。它似乎在不久之前撞到了小行星。

經過進一步調查後，我們得出結論，可以回收利用它的部分記憶體。記憶體儲存的資料可能對我們未來的工作有用，不幸的是，我們無法恢復全部資料。

Text: There are still some Martian surface scans stored in undamaged sectors. Try to extract those.
Translation: 未損壞的扇區中仍存有一些火星地表的掃描資料。想辦法提取那些資料吧。

Text: Recover the data it has on the surrounding space.

Translation: 必須至少有1個偵察中心

Text: Some of our engineers and marketing experts have pitched an idea to us for an event in the Martian underground. They want to manually race some of our shuttles through the tunnels! Our marketing team is already negotiating with various entertainment companies on Earth for the rights to air the event. This could be a very profitable venture.
Translation: 我們的部分工程師和營銷專家向我們提出在火星地下舉辦活動的想法。他們想人工駕駛穿梭機在隧道里辦一場競速！我們的營銷團隊已經準備好和地球上的多家娛樂公司談判，爭取轉播權。這可能是一個非常賺錢的經營專案。
Old Text: Some of our engineers and marketing experts have pitched an idea to us for an event in the Martian underground. They want to manually race some or our shuttles through the tunnels! Our marketing team is already negotiating with various entertainment companies on Earth for the rights to air the event. This could be a very profitable venture.
Old Translation: 我们的部分工程师和营销专家向我们提出在火星地下举办活动的想法。他们想人工驾驶穿梭机在隧道里办一场竞速竞速！我们的营销团队已经准备好和地球上的多家娱乐公司谈判，争取转播权。这可能是一个非常赚钱的经营项目。

Text: Nothing beats some high stakes racing!
Translation: 有誰不愛高獎金的比賽呢！
獲得<funding(saleproceeds)>，但有損失穿梭機的風險

Text: Let's not risk our resources so frivolously.
Translation: 我們還是不要這麼輕率地拿資源冒險。

Text:
All looked to be going well until a last-minute crash took out multiple Shuttles. While this is undoubtedly good for the viewer ratings it is a big loss for our operations. The good news is that no colonists were injured as a result of this disaster.

<effect> Gain <funding(saleproceeds)>, but lose 3 Shuttles
Translation:
一切都進行地很順利，只可惜在最後時刻發生了墜機事件，好幾架穿梭機被毀。雖然這無疑將直播效果拉滿，但對我們的事業來說是個巨大的損失。好訊息是在這次災難中，沒有殖民地居民的人員傷亡。

<effect>獲得<funding(saleproceeds)>，但失去3架穿梭機
穿梭機競速——災難性墜機

Text:
While the event was a huge success one of the Shuttles got damaged beyond repair. Fortunately, no colonists were harmed!

<effect> Gain <funding(saleproceeds)>, but lose 1 Shuttle
Translation:
活動大獲成功的同時，有一架穿梭機受損到了無法修復的地步。幸運的是，沒有殖民地居民受傷！

<effect>獲得<funding(saleproceeds)>，但失去1架穿梭機

Text:
The Great Underground Shuttle race was a huge success. Viewer ratings on Earth were through the roof and none of our shuttles were damaged in the process.

<effect> Gain <funding(saleproceeds)>
Translation:
地下穿梭機競速大獲成功。地球上的收視率已突破天際，而在此過程中我們的穿梭機沒有受損。

<effect>獲得<funding(saleproceeds)>

Text: Our scientists believe that we have discovered a new super habitable planet. These planets are supposed to offer even more ideal conditions for life than Earth itself. Only a small number of these planets have been discovered so far, making this a monumental discovery.
Translation: 我們的科學家認為我們發現了一顆新的超宜居行星。這些行星應該能提供比地球本身更適合生命的環境。到目前為止，只發現了少量這種行星，這使得這次的發現意義重大。

Text: Publish the findings and report immediately!
Translation: 公佈發現，並立即進行報道！

Text: Gain <funding(publishingreward)> from enthusiastic patrons on Earth
Translation: 從地球上的熱心贊助人獲得<funding(publishingreward)>

Text: The findings were received with all the enthusiasm we expected!
Translation: 不出我們所料，該發現收到了極大的關注！

Text: The findings were received with all the enthusiasm we expected!
Translation: 不出我們所料，該發現收到了極大的關注！

Text: Hold off with publishing until we are sure.
Translation: 在我們確定前不要公佈。

Text:
It seems we were too hasty in our publication. The research was quickly discredited and various flaws in our method were brought to light. We are sure to lose face over this. 

<effect> Scientists suffer a Morale penalty for 15 sols
Translation:
看起來我們的公佈太倉促了。這項研究很快受到了質疑，我們方法中的很多缺陷也暴露了出來。我們這次臉丟大了。

<effect>科學家受到士氣懲罰，持續15個太陽日

Text:
After closer investigation we have come to the conclusion that our initial observations were a false positive. A quirk in our software twisted the readings into something else than we hoped. On the other hand, we did manage to optimize our observation software which will benefit us in the future!

<effect> Gain a boost in Discovery Progress
Translation:
經過仔細調查後，我們得出結論，最初的觀察結果不實。我們軟體中的一處錯誤將讀數改成了我們不希望的東西。另一方面，我們成功最佳化了觀測軟體，這將使我們在未來受益！

<effect>獲得發現進度加成

Text:
After running the data again, we have confirmed our initial conclusions! Publishing these findings is sure to excite and increase our credibility in the scientific community.

<effect> Gain <funding(publishingreward)>
Translation:
再次驗證資料後，我們確認了最初的結論！公佈這些發現肯定會激發並提升我們在科學界的信譽。

<effect>獲得<funding(publishingreward)>

Text:
Our scientists suggest we run our deep scanning technology in the underground.

We have to chose what we will scan for to reduce the number of false positives. It will be a long process but it will reveal deposits that we are bound to miss otherwise.
Translation:
我們的科學家建議我們在地下執行深層掃描技術。

我們必須選擇待掃描的內容，以減少假陽性結果的數量。顯示資源點的過程將很漫長，但如果不這樣，我們必將錯過它們。

Text: Run a Deep Scan of the Underground
We can't populate the underground without a reliable supply of water to sustain our Colonists.
Translation: 如果沒有可靠的水資源供應，就無法維持我們殖民地居民的生存，也就不可能居住在地下。

Text: Reveal a rich water deposit in the underground after <sols(scanning_duration)> Sols
Translation: 在<sols(scanning_duration)>個太陽日後顯示一處富含水的地下資源點

Text: Metal is fundamental, and more importantly it's what we need right now.
Translation: 金屬是基礎，更重要的是它是我們現在急需的。

Text: Reveal a rich metal deposit in the underground after <sols(scanning_duration)> Sols
Translation: 在<sols(scanning_duration)>個太陽日後顯示一處富含金屬的地下資源點

Text: Finding more Rare Metals is vital to finance our endeavours
Translation: 找到更多的稀有金屬對緩解我們的資金壓力至關重要

Text: Reveal a rich rare metal deposit in the underground after <sols(scanning_duration)> Sols
Translation: 在<sols(scanning_duration)>個太陽日後顯示一處富含稀有金屬的地下資源點

Text: The Recon & Expansion field deals with exploring and expanding the mars initiative into the Underground and Asteroids.
Translation: 偵察和擴張領域涉及將探索和擴張火星計劃推廣至地下和小行星帶。

Text: Landing an Asteroid Lander on an Asteroid captures the Asteroid in orbit around Mars, which removes the time limit. "This planet is 15 million years overdue for an asteroid strike like the one that killed the dinosaurs." L. Neil Smith
Translation: 讓小行星登陸艙在小行星上著陸即可捕獲火星軌道上的小行星，並移除時間限制。 “這顆星球早在1500萬年前就該經歷一次小行星撞擊了，就像導致恐龍滅絕的那次一樣。” L·尼爾·史密斯

Text: Reduces the cargo weight of resources by %. This bay has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions.
Translation: 資源貨物重量降低%。 此艙的內部空間比外部尺寸大得多。

Text: Unlock the unique building and RC Vehicle of a random sponsor. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean" Ryunosuke Satoro
Translation: 解鎖獨特建築和遙控載具 ，贊助者不限。 此技術可重複且可以多次研究。 “每個人都只是小水滴。匯聚一處，便成江海。” 芥川龍之介

Text: Receive applicants with rare traits. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "The goal, or should I say, the dream is to build a colony. A self-sufficient new world, far away from earth." Voice Over
Translation: 獲得名擁有稀有特徵的應徵者。 此技術可重複且可以多次研究。 “目標，或者說夢想是建造一座殖民地。一個遠離地球且自給自足的新世界。” 旁白

Text:
Colonists restore sanity while sleeping in the Underground instead of losing sanity.
Colonists also gain <param1> morale while they are in the underground.

<grey>If humanity had never seen sunlight, they wouldn't miss it.</grey>
Translation:
殖民地居民在地下睡眠時，理智度不再下降，而是上升。
殖民地居民在地下時，還會獲得<param1>士氣。

<grey>假如人類從未見過陽光，他們也不會心生嚮往。</grey>

Text: Reduces the cargo weight of drones and RC vehicles by %. "At the end of the day, we can endure much more than we think we can." Frida Kahlo
Translation: 無人機和遙控載具的貨物重量降低%。 “到頭來，我們發現自己的承受能力比我們想象的強得多。” 弗裡達·卡羅

Text: Building: Artifact Interface () - Enables us to control the Ancient Artifact. Developing a device that can interface with the Artifact is equal parts art and science.
Translation: 建築：製品介面（）——讓我們能控制遠古種族製品。 研發一種能和製品對接的裝置，既是藝術，又是科學。
Old Text:
Unlocks the Artifact Interface.

<grey>Developing a device that can interface with the Artifact is equal parts art and science.</grey>
Old Translation:
解锁制品接口。

<grey>研发一种能和制品对接的装置，既是艺术，又是科学。</grey>

Text: Building: Bottomless Pit Lab () - . So we can further study the Pit. “There are things done in the name of science which are ridiculous. But there is also stuff done which sounds funny but is really serious.” Margaret Geller
Translation: 建築：無底深坑實驗室（）—— 讓我們能進一步研究深坑 “有些打著科學的名義做的事情很荒謬。但也有一些事情做得聽起來很滑稽，但其實很嚴肅。” 瑪格利特·蓋勒
Old Text:
Unlocks the Bottomless Pit Lab building.

<grey>“There are things done under the name of science which are ridiculous. But there is also stuff done which sounds funny but is really serious.” 
<right>Margaret Geller</grey><left>
Old Translation:
解锁无底深坑实验室建筑。

<grey>“有些打着科学的名义做的事情很荒谬。但也有一些事情做得听起来很滑稽，但其实很严肃。”
<right>玛格利特·盖勒</grey><left>

Text: Building: Wondrous Crystals () - Increases the morale of colonists who live in the same dome. Its hypnotic beauty has shown to be an inspiration to many colonists.
Translation: 建築：奇異水晶（）——提高居住在同坐穹頂殖民地居民的使其。 它具有催眠效果的美鼓舞了很多殖民地居民。

Text: Building: Jumbo Cave Reinforcements () - Improve the structural integrity of the Jumbo Cave. The safety of our colonists is paramount to the effort required to construct this mega structure.
Translation: 建築：巨型洞穴加固（）——提高巨型洞穴的結構完整度。 我們殖民地居民的安全對於建造這個巨型建築的所需的努力至關重要。
Old Text:
Unlocks the Jumbo Cave Reinforcements.

<grey>The safety of our colonists is paramount to the effort required to construct this mega structure.</grey>
Old Translation:
解锁巨型洞穴加固。

<grey>我们殖民地居民的安全对于建造这个巨型建筑的所需的努力至关重要。</grey>

Text: Arcology Upgrade (Mineral Reinforced High-risers) - Increased resident space. Cloning Vats (Mineral Accelerants) - Increased cloning speed. Hanging Gardens (Exotic Mineral Structures) - Increased comfort boost for the dome. Medical Center (Exotic Mineral Treatment) - Increased Health and Sanity recovery. Network Node (Exotic Mineral Computers) - Increased research boost for the dome. Sanatorium (Exotic Mineral Therapy) - Can remove the Renegade flaw. Water Reclamation System (Exotic Mineral Automation) - No longer requires workers.
Translation: 生態建築學升級（礦物加固高層建築）——增加居住空間。 複製中心（礦物加速劑）——提高複製速度。 空中花園（奇異礦物建築）——提高穹頂的舒適度加成。 醫療中心（奇異礦物治療）——提高生命值和理智度恢復。 網路節點（奇異礦物電腦）——提高穹頂的研究加成。 療養院（奇異礦物療法）——可移除叛徒缺陷。 水資源回收系統（奇異礦物自動化）——不再需要工人。

Text: Building: Jumbo Cave Reinforcements () - A medium-sized Dome for the Underground. With space being the limiting factor below the Martian surface, we have to make the most of every inch we can find.
Translation: 建築：巨型洞穴加固（）——一種地下中型穹頂。 火星地表下的空間寸土寸金，我們得充分利用能找到的每一寸空間。
Old Text:
Unlocks the Underground Medium Dome.

<grey>With space being the limiting factor below the Martian surface, we have to make the most of every inch we can find.</grey>
Old Translation:
解锁地下中型穹顶。

<grey>火星地表下的空间寸土寸金，我们得充分利用能找到的每一寸空间。</grey>

Text: Building: Elevator () - Connects the Martian surface to the Martian Underground to transport resources, vehicles, prefabs and colonists. “Those who go beneath the surface, do so at their peril.” Oscar Wilde
Translation: 建築：電梯（）——連線火星地表與地下，能在兩地之間往返運送資源、載具、預製件和殖民地居民。 “那些深入地表之下者，請自擔風險。” 奧斯卡·王爾德
Old Text: Building: Elevator () - Connects the main colony and the underground. “Those who go beneath the surface, do so at their peril.” Oscar Wilde
Old Translation: 建筑：电梯（）——连接主殖民地和地下。 “那些深入地表之下者，请自担风险。” 奥斯卡·王尔德

Old Text: Low-G Shaft Digging
Old Translation: 低重力矿井挖掘

Text: Building: Light Tripod - These lights function without being connected to a power grid. Perfect for lighting hard to reach places. "May it be a light to you in dark places, when all other lights go out.” J.R.R. Tolkien
Translation: 建築：三腳架燈——這些燈不用連線到電網也能正常工作。非常適合照明難以到達的地方。 “當所有的燈都熄滅的時候，願它在黑暗中為你帶來光明。” J.R.R.托爾金

Text: New Asteroid Landers can be ordered from Earth - They can land on Asteroids and ferry resources and colonists between them and our main colony on Mars. "Once I got into space, I was feeling very comfortable in the universe. I felt like I had a right to be anywhere in this universe, that I belonged here as much as any speck of stardust, any comet, any planet." Mae C. Jemison
Translation: 可向地球訂購新的小行星登陸艙。它們能降落在小行星上，並在小行星和火星主要殖民地之間運輸資源與殖民地居民。 “我進入太空後，在宇宙中感覺非常自在。感覺就像我有權利去宇宙中的任何地方，我就像任何星塵、彗星和行星一樣屬於這裡。” 梅·傑米森
Old Text: Building: Asteroid Lander () - Can land on Asteroids and ferry resources and colonists between them and the colony. "Once I got into space, I was feeling very comfortable in the universe. I felt like I had a right to be anywhere in this universe, that I belonged here as much as any speck of stardust, any comet, any planet." Mae C. Jemison
Old Translation: 建筑：小行星登陆舱（）——可以着陆于小行星上，在小行星和殖民地间运送资源和殖民地居民。 “我进入太空后，在宇宙中感觉非常舒服。感觉就像我有权利去宇宙中的任何地方，我就像任何星尘、彗星和行星一样属于这里。” 梅·杰米森

Text: Building: Underground Dome (), Underground Micro Dome () - Domes optimized to sustain colonists in subsurface environments. Also allows certain other surface buildings to be build underground. The new composite materials used in their construction make them much more resilient than the standard Domes we construct on the surface of Mars.
Translation: 建築：地下穹頂（），地下微型穹頂（）——最佳化過的穹頂，用來維持地下環境中殖民地居民的生存。 同時允許其他特定地表建築建造在地下。 它們用新型符合材料建成，比我們在火星地表建造的普通穹頂更耐用。
Old Text: Building: Underground Dome (), Underground Micro Dome ()- Domes optimized to sustain colonists in subsurface environments. Also allows certain other surface buildings to be build underground. The new composite materials used in their construction make them much more resilient than the standard Domes we construct on the surface of Mars.
Old Translation: 建筑：地下穹顶（），地下微型穹顶（）——优化过的穹顶，用来维持地下环境中殖民地居民的生存。 同时允许其他特定地表建筑建造在地下。 它们用新型符合材料建成，比我们在火星地表建造的普通穹顶更耐用。

Text: Building: Recon Center () - Works towards discovering new Asteroids and other discoveries. “Scientists normally like to do experiments. You know, they like to mix this with that and see what happens. They like to take this thing and poke it and see how it reacts. In astronomy, we can't do that. The stars, the planets, the galaxies, are so far away that we just look at them, and we have to learn things by looking at them.” Heidi Hammel
Translation: 建築：偵察中心 () - 能慢慢發現新小行星和其他東西。 “科學家通常喜歡做實驗。你也知道，他們喜歡把東西混在一起，看看會發生什麼。他們喜歡拿這個東西戳它，看看有什麼反應。在天文學中，我們不能這麼做。恆星、行星和星系，都離我們太遠了，我們只能看著它們，而我們必須透過觀察它們來學習。” 海蒂·哈默爾
Old Text: Building: Recon Center () - Generates Recon overtime. “Scientists normally like to do experiments. You know, they like to mix this with that and see what happens. They like to take this thing and poke it and see how it reacts. In astronomy, we can't do that. The stars, the planets, the galaxies, are so far away that we just look at them, and we have to learn things by looking at them.” Heidi Hammel
Old Translation: 建筑：侦察中心（）——随时间产生侦察。 “科学家通常喜欢做实验。你也知道，他们喜欢把东西混在一起，看看会发生什么。他们喜欢拿这个东西戳它，看看有什么反应。在天文学中，我们不能这么做。恒星、行星和星系，都离我们太远了，我们只能看着它们，而我们必须通过观察它们来学习。” 海蒂·哈默尔

Text: Building: Drone Hub Extender () - Extends the range in which Drone Hubs can control drones. Increasing the effective range of our Drone Hubs is an invaluable tool in our efforts to effectively expand into the Martian underground.
Translation: 建築：無人機中心擴充套件（）——擴大無人機中心控制無人機的範圍。 增加我們無人機中心的有效範圍是我們努力發展火星地下世界的寶貴的工具。

Text: Solar Panel Upgrade (Improved Photovoltaics) - Power production increased by %. Infirmary and Medical Post Upgrade (Exotic Mineral Treatment) - Health and Sanity recovery increased by . Exotic Minerals have a variety of beneficial properties which we can use to strengthen our colony.
Translation: 太陽能板升級（改進版光伏）——電力產量提升%。 醫務室和醫療站升級（奇異礦物治療）——生命值與理智度恢復提升。 奇異礦物妙用多多，我們能用它來強化我們的殖民地。
Old Text: Solar Panel Upgrade (Improved Photovoltaics) - Power production increased by %. Infirmary Upgrade (Exotic Mineral Treatment) - Health and Sanity recovery increased by . Exotic Minerals have a variety of beneficial properties which we can use to strengthen our colony.
Old Translation: 太阳能板升级（改进版光伏）——电力产量提升%。 医务室升级（奇异矿物治疗）——生命值与理智度恢复提升。 奇异矿物妙用多多，我们能用它来强化我们的殖民地。

Text: Building: Micro-G Auto Extractor (), Micro-G Water Extractor () - Extract resources & water from Asteroids without requiring any workers. With these specialty extractors the rich resources that lie buried beneath an asteroid’s surface are no longer out of reach.
Translation: 建築：微重力自動挖掘站（），微重力水資源挖掘站（）——無需工人，從小行星開採資源和水。 有了這些專門的挖掘站，埋藏在小行星表面下的豐富資源不再是遙不可及的了。

Text: Allows clearing of Collapsed Tunnels, clearing unstable areas of the underground safely. Detailed surveys of the structural integrity of the Martian underground allows us to be bolder in our excavation efforts without risking unnecessary tunnel collapses.
Translation: 允許清除塌方的隧道，安全地清理地下不穩定區域。 對火星地下結構完整性的詳細勘測讓我們在挖掘工作時更大膽，而不用在塌方的隧道中冒不必要的風險。
Old Text:
Allows clearing of cave-ins, clearing unstable areas of the underground safely.

<grey>Detailed surveys of the structural integrity of the Martian underground allows us to be bolder in our excavation efforts without risking unnecessary cave-ins.</grey>
Old Translation:
允许清除塌方，安全地清理地下不稳定区域。

<grey>对火星地下结构完整性的详细勘测让我们在挖掘工作时更大胆，而不用冒不必要的塌方风险。</grey>

Text: Building: Support Strut () - Reduce the risk of cave-ins. “Even with all our technology and the inventions that make modern life so much easier than it once was, it takes just one big natural disaster to wipe all that away and remind us that, here on Earth, we're still at the mercy of nature.” Neil deGrasse Tyson
Translation: 建築：支撐柱（）——降低塌方的風險。 “儘管我們的技術和發明讓現代生活比以前容易很多，但只要一次大的自然災害就能把這些都抹去。這提醒我們，在地球上，我們還是受大自然支配。” 奈爾·德葛拉司·泰森

Text: Reduces the travel time between Asteroids and Mars by %. By improving the models we use to calculate and predict the gravitational forces at work when asteroids pass by Mars, we have optimized travel procedures beyond anything we thought practical.
Translation: 小行星和火星間的旅行時間縮短%。 透過改進計算和預計小行星經過火星時產生的引力的模型，我們最佳化了旅行程式，結果好得出乎我們的預料。

Text: Asteroid Lander Upgrade (Extended Cargo Module) - Cargo capacity increases by kg and fuel consumption increases by . “Storage experts are hoarders." Marie Kondo
Translation: 小行星登陸艙（擴充套件貨運模組）——貨艙容量增加千克，燃料消耗增加。 “儲存專家是囤積狂。” 近藤麻理惠
Old Text: Rocket Upgrade (Extended Cargo Module) - Cargo capacity increases by kg and fuel consumption increases by . “Storage experts are hoarders." Marie Kondo
Old Translation: 火箭升级（扩展货运模块）——货舱容量增加千克，燃料消耗增加。 “存储专家是囤积狂。” 近藤麻理惠

Text:
Shuttle Hubs can be built underground and will function in the same manner as on the surface.

<grey>The high complexity of the logistics in the Martian underground has made operating shuttles there a necessity rather than a death-wish.</grey>
Translation:
穿梭機中心可以建在地下，並和在地表一樣正常運作。

<grey>火星地下物流的高複雜度讓操作穿梭機成為一種必要需求，而不是沒事找死。</grey>

Text: Building: Micro-G Mining Station (), Micro-G Habitat () - Allow colonists to stay and work on Asteroids. There is only so much we can do with just automation. It is time we send colonists to do the work that our machines cannot.
Translation: 建築：微重力採礦站（），微重力居住地（）——允許殖民地居民在小行星上居住和工作。 我們依靠自動化能做到的事情很有限。這次終於輪到我們派殖民地居民去做那些機器無法完成的工作了。

Text: Increases the service range on Drone Hubs and Drone Hub Extenders by hexes. “In the new era, thought itself will be transmitted by radio.” Guglielmo Marconi
Translation: 無人機中心和無人機中心擴充套件的服務範圍增加格。 “在新的時代，思維本身將透過無線電傳播。” 古列爾莫·馬可尼
Old Text: Increase service range on Drone Hubs and Drone Hub Extenders by hexes. “In the new era, thought itself will be transmitted by radio.” Guglielmo Marconi
Old Translation: 无人机中心和无人机中心扩展的服务范围增加格。 “在新的时代，思维本身将通过无线电传播。” 古列尔莫·马可尼

Text: Deep deposits are now revealed on Asteroids. Exploiting these deposits requires additional technologies. The finesse needed to safely mine an asteroid's deepest deposits without damaging its structural integrity is not to be underestimated.
Translation: 小行星上的深層資源點現已顯示。開發這些資源點需要額外的技術。 安全開採小行星最深層的資源而不損壞其結構完整性所需的技術不應被低估。

Text:
Increases the time window for mining Asteroids by <param1>%.

<grey>"This isn't flying, this is falling with style.”
<right>Buzz Lightyear</grey><left>
Translation:
使小行星的開採時機延長<param1>%。

<grey>“這不叫飛，這叫帥氣地下墜！”
<right>巴斯光年</grey><left>
Old Text:
Extend the window of opportunity for Asteroids by <param1>%.

<grey>"This isn't flying, this is falling with style.”
<right>Buzz Lightyear</grey><left>
Old Translation:
使小行星的机会窗口期延长<param1>%。

<grey>“这不叫飞，这叫帅气地下坠！”
<right>巴斯光年</grey><left>

Text: Recon Center Upgrade (Recon Center) - Recon generated per Sol increased by % and Power consumption increased by . “Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.” Carl Sagan
Translation: 偵察中心升級（偵察中心）——每個太陽日產生的偵察提高%，電力消耗提高。 “令人難以置信的事情正在某處等待著被人們發現。” 卡爾·薩根
Old Text: Recon Center Upgrade (Recon Center) - Recon generated per Sol increased by % and Power consumption increased by %. “Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.” Carl Sagan
Old Translation: 侦察中心升级（侦察中心）——每个太阳日产生的侦察提高%，电力消耗提高%。 “令人难以置信的事情正在某处等待着被人们发现。” 卡尔·萨根

Text:
Reduces sanity loss from living and working underground.

<grey>Dealing with the oppressive darkness of the underground isn’t something that comes natural to most. Helping our individual colonists deal with this alien environment will benefit us all.</grey>
Translation:
減少在地下居住和工作的理智度損失。

<grey>應對地下令人壓抑的黑暗並不是大多數人與生俱來的本事。幫我們的殖民地居民應對這種外星環境將使我們全體受益。</grey>

Text: Allows buildings to be converted back into Prefabs so they can be deployed again in a different location. All materials are precious on Mars, from the smallest bolt to the largest beam. We shall let nothing go to waste.
Translation: 允許建築被轉化回預製件，這樣它們就能再次部署在不同的位置。 火星上所有材料都很珍貴，從最小的螺栓到最大的橫樑。我們什麼都不會浪費。

Text: Dreams of the stars, but stuck on the ground.
Translation: 嚮往著星辰大海，卻被困在了地上。

Old Translation: <new_in('picard')>小行星登陆舱

Old Translation: 自动装载

Old Text: Auto load
Old Translation: 自动装载

Text:
In Auto Mode, the Elevator will automatically request resources, vehicles, colonists and prefabs to meet the minimum you configured.
If something is below the minimum, it will not be sent to the other side.
Translation:
在自動模式下，電梯會自動請求資源、載具、殖民地居民和預製件，以滿足你配置的最低需求。
如果某一項低於最低值，則不會被運到另一側。

Text: Unpack an existing Drone Prefab to build a new Drone. Drone Prefabs can be created from existing Drones or in a Drone Assembler (requires research). This action can be used to quickly reassign Drones between controllers.<newline><newline>Available Drone Prefabs: <drone(available_drone_prefabs)>
Translation: 開啟已有的無人機預製件，製造新的無人機。您可以透過已有的無人機制造無人機預製件，也可以在無人機裝配廠中生產預製件（需要相關研究）。透過這個方式，您可以對不同控制單元的無人機進行快速重新指派。<newline><newline>可用的無人機預製件：<drone(available_drone_prefabs)>
開啟無人機Ctrl + 開啟五個無人機
<ButtonA>開啟無人機<ButtonX>開啟五個無人機

Text: Recalls a Drone and packs it into a Drone Prefab. Can be used to reassign Drones between controllers.
Translation: 將無人機召回，並將其打包為無人機預製件。這一命令可以用來重新指派不同控制單元的無人機。
打包無人機進行重新指派

Text: Pack Drone for reassignment Ctrl + Pack five Drones
Translation: 打包無人機進行重新指派Ctrl + 打包五個無人機

Text: <ButtonA> Pack Drone for reassignment <ButtonX> Pack five Drones
Translation: <ButtonA>打包無人機進行重新指派 <ButtonX> 打包五個無人機

Text: Request Drones to clear the rubble.
Translation: 需要無人機來清除碎石。
Old Text: Request Drones to clear the Cave-In.
Old Translation: 需要无人机来清除塌方。

Text: This rubble is too unstable to clear safely. We should be able to clear this in the future once we know more about the underground.
Translation: 碎石結構不夠穩定，無法安全清除。在我們對地下有更多的瞭解後，應該能將其清除。
Old Text: This area is too unstable to perform any major adjustments. We may be able to clear the Cave-In in the future once we know more about the underground.
Old Translation: 该区域太不稳定，无法进行任何重大调整。一旦我们对地下有更多的了解，将来我们也许能清理塌方。

Old Text: Clear Cave-In
Old Translation: 清理塌方

Text: Links the Drone Hub Extender to a Drone Hub or another Drone Hub Extender
Translation: 將無人機中心擴充套件連線至無人機中心或另一個無人機中心擴充套件

Text: Edit cargo to transfer between <destination_map> and <origin_map>. Anything arriving at the <display_name> is instantly sent to the <origin_map>. The cargo request can be modified at any time.
Translation: 編輯要在<destination_map>和<origin_map>之間運輸的貨物。任何到達<display_name>的東西都會立即運送至<origin_map>。任何時候都可以修改貨物請求。
Old Text: Select a payload to send to the <other_map>. Anything arriving at the <display_name> is instantly sent to the <other_map>. The payload request can be modified at any time.
Old Translation: 选择要运送至<other_map>的货物。任何到达<display_name>的东西都会立即运送至<other_map>。任何时候都可以修改货物请求。

Old Text: Switch the map to the other side of the Elevator.
Old Translation: 切换至电梯另一侧的地图。

Text: If Automated mode is activated the Elevator will automatically request resources, prefabs, drones and RC vehicles depending on the minimum amount configured. Current status:
Translation: 自動模式啟動後，電梯將自動按需求索取資源、預製件、無人機和遙控載具，具體數量由設定的最小所需數量決定。 當前狀態：
Old Text: If Automated mode is activated the Elevator will automatically request resources, prefabs, drones and RC vehicles depending on the minimum amount configured. Current status:
Old Translation: 自动模式启动后，电梯将自动安需求索取资源、预制件、无人机和遥控载具，具体数量由设置的最小所需数量决定。 当前状态：

Old Text: <PayloadRolloverText>
Old Translation: <PayloadRolloverText>

Old Text: Resources the elevator is unloading.
Old Translation: 电梯正在卸下的资源。

Text: Select the payload to bring along to an Asteroid. This can still be modified before departure.
Translation: 選擇要帶到小行星上的貨物。在發射前這仍然可以更改。

Text: Send this Rocket to an Asteroid. The Rocket will depart once it is refueled and its requested cargo is loaded. Status:
Translation: 發射這枚火箭至小行星。一旦補充燃料並裝載請求的貨物後，火箭就會發射。 狀態：

Text: Send this Rocket to Mars. The Rocket will depart once it is refueled and its requested cargo is loaded. Status:
Translation: 發射這枚火箭至火星。一旦補充燃料並裝載請求的貨物後，火箭就會發射。 狀態：

Text: Launch immediately with the loaded resources and everything marked as Ready! Status:
Translation: 攜帶已裝載的資源以及一切帶有準備就緒標記的貨物立即發射！ 狀態：
Old Text: Cancel the requested payload and launch immediately! Status:
Old Translation: 取消请求的货物并立即发射！ 状态：

Text:
Cancels the flight to the current destination.

The requested payload remains unchanged.
Translation:
取消飛往當前目的地的航班。

請求的貨物保持不變。
Old Text: Cancel visiting the asteroid (left loaded fuel and the cargo request as is)
Old Translation: 取消访问小行星（装载的燃料和货物请求保持不变）

Old Text: Cancel visiting the asteroid
Old Translation: 取消访问小行星

Text: If Automated mode is activated the Asteroid Lander will automatically request a payload based on resources, prefabs, drones and RC vehicles available on the Asteroid. Resources needed for construction, maintenance or other processes are automatically removed. The Asteroid Lander will not depart until it has a destination set and all cargo is loaded. Use the edit payload screen to adjust priorities. Current status:
Translation: 若啟動自動模式，小行星登陸艙會根據小行星上可用的資源、預製件、無人機和遙控載具自動請求貨物。建造、維護或其他工作所需的資源被自動移除。小行星登陸艙只有在設定不敵低切所有貨物都裝好後才會出發。 使用編輯貨物介面調整優先順序。 當前狀態：
Old Text: If Automated mode is activated the Asteroid Lander will automatically request a payload based on resources, prefabs, drones and RC vehicles available on the Asteroid. Resources needed for construction, maintenance or other processes are automatically removed. The Asteroid Lander will not depart until it has a destination set and all cargo is loaded. Use the edit payload screen to adjust priorities. Current status:
Old Translation: 若启动自动模式，小行星登陆舱会根据小行星上可用的资源、预制件、无人机和遥控载具自动请求货物。建造、维护或其他工作所需的资源被自动移除。小行星登陆舱只有在设置不敌低切所有货物都装好后才会出发。 使用编辑货物界面调整优先级。 当前状态：

Text: Drones commanded by the Rocket ship.
Translation: 無人機由火箭進行指揮。

Old Text: <PayloadRolloverText>
Old Translation: <PayloadRolloverText>

Translation: 火箭運輸的貨物已請求

Text: Filter Colonists in the Habitat by desired or undesired traits. Colonists that do not match the filter will try to resettle in another Dome or Habitat. If a Quarantine was set for the Habitat, this action will remove it.
Translation: 按需要或不需要的特性，篩選居住地的居民。與篩選條件不符的居民會前往另一個穹頂或居住地定居。如果居住地被設定成了隔離區，這項操作將解除隔離設定。

Text: Set the birth policy for this Habitat. Colonists at high comfort will have children if births are allowed.Current status: Births are allowed
Translation: 設定當前居住地的生育政策。在允許生育的情況下，舒適度高的殖民地居民會生兒育女。當前狀態：允許生育

Translation: 當此居住地人滿時禁止生育Ctrl + 當所有居住地人滿時禁止生育

Translation: 設定當前居住地的移民政策。殖民地居民無法出入處於隔離狀態的穹頂和居住地。當前狀態：接受新居民

Text: We can use that are stored across Recon Centers to perform a more detailed scan of Asteroids as we discover them.
Translation: 當發現小行星時，我們可以利用儲存在偵察中心的對它們進行更詳細的掃描。

Text: Build underground bases and mine orbiting asteroids in Below and Beyond, the latest expansion for Surviving Mars.
Translation: 藉助最新的《上天入地》擴充套件來建造地下基地和環小行星礦井。
Old Text: Below and Beyond is the third expansion of Surviving Mars, adding Underground exploration and expansion and the exploitation of Asteroids.
Old Translation: 上天入地是《火星求生》的第三部资料片，新增了地下探索和扩张，以及对小行星的开采。
